conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric projection with clear wall thickness and floor differentiation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation; wall heights and corner geometry are consistent. Minimal perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. All rooms for the Master Suite, Theatre, Garage, and individual bedrooms are correctly placed. Closet/Robe recesses and pantry layout align perfectly with the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (dining, living, beds) and kitchen island are precisely positioned. Bathroom fixtures even include the specific shower/toilet placements.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Geometry is readable. Deduction for minor lack of material variety, though lighting is excellent.

detected_errors.description: Some interior swing doors are shown as open gaps rather than having door leaf geometry.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D conversion that maintains every architectural detail of the original floor plan.
